We scan the list to show you your total records and cost, and at the click of a button you are off and running.</p><p>After verification is completed, you can download your list, or automatically unsubscribe invalid and risky emails from your campaigns.</p></div></div></section></div><div class=\"sec-group\" id=\"api\"><section class=\"home-realtime home-section\"><div class=\"home-realtime-title\"><div class=\"layout\"><h3>Staying clean is as easy as cut &amp; paste</h3><img alt=\"\" class=\"home-realtime-bg\" width=\"1097\" height=\"521\" src=\"https://bvweb-herokuapp-com.global.ssl.fastly.net/assets/home/realtime-bg-17c520490295057d896d0b3c1ac66c2660ad01fb5c1fc1f13337c67855cdf384.png\"></div></div><div class=\"home-realtime-text\"><div class=\"layout\"><p>Real-time validation, secure form protection, and detailed form metrics put you in control of your forms like never before,<br class=\"hidden-xs\">helping  you accomplish what matters most: connecting with <em>real people</em>.</p><p>BriteForms eliminates email-entry mistakes, fights form spamming, and creates a better overall form experience. The best part?<br class=\"hidden-xs\">The simple cut &amp; paste installation integrates seamlessly with your existing form.<br class=\"hidden-xs\">Yeah, we thought that was pretty awesome too.</p><p>Or use our Real-Time API to prevent bad email addresses from entering your systems in the first place.</p><p><a class=\"btn btn-primary\" href=\"/briteforms\">Learn More About BriteForms</a><a class=\"btn btn-primary\" href=\"http://docs.briteverify.com/real-time-api/\" target=\"_blank\">Learn About Our Real-Time API</a></p></div></div></section><section class=\"home-support home-section\"><div class=\"home-support-title\"><div class=\"layout\"><h3>Support thatâ€™s always on</h3><img alt=\"\" class=\"home-support-bg\" width=\"913\" height=\"563\" src=\"https://bvweb-herokuapp-com.global.ssl.fastly.net/assets/home/support-bg-4f60d7514affd30a2f1e94aede6c7bff1b5528d6984ab186dad7ca1649e45995.png\"></div></div><div class=\"home-support-text\"><div class=\"layout\"><p>With 24/7 in-app support and an online knowledge base at your disposal, help is never further than a few clicks away.<br class=\"hidden-xs\">You can choose to either connect with one of our customer support representatives while you are in the app itself, or check out <a href=\"http://docs.briteverify.com/\">our documentation site</a>.</p><p>If you have questions or need assistance signing up, you can <a href=\"javascript:Intercom('show');\">contact us</a> any time.</p></div></div></section></div><div class=\"sec-group\" id=\"pricing\"><section class=\"home-pricing home-section\"><div class=\"home-pricing-title\"><div class=\"layout\"><h3>Starting at just a penny per verification</h3><p>Your first 250,000 verifications per month are just a penny each and we build discounts into our payment structure.<br class=\"hidden-xs\">So your pricing automatically decreases the more you verify.
